snippet.title: Little Cities: Bigger! | Announce Trailer | PS VR2
snippet.description:
Little Cities: Bigger! will arrive on PlayStation VR2 on March 12th, bringing cosy creativity, hours of fuss-free fun, and oodles of content to the platform.

Follow nDreams! 
Twitter / X: @nDreams  
Discord: https://discord.gg/ndreams

Buy the game here - https://bit.ly/49obCV6

#VR #LittleCitiesBigger #PlayStation #PSVR #VRGaming
